text: Donald Reed Harnby (20 July 1923 – 24 October 2009) was an English professional footballer who played as a full-back in the Football League for York City and Grimsby Town, in non-League football for Spennymoor United, and was on the books of Newcastle United without making a league appearance. He played wartime football for Middlesbrough. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:People from County Durham Category:2009 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Spennymoor United F.C. players Category:Newcastle United F.C. players Category:York City F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Middlesbrough F.C. wartime guest players
title: Don Harnby
